column1: Logistics and Supply Chain Analytics MSc
column5: Elevate your expertise with the MSc in Logistics and Supply Chain Analytics at the University of Southampton. Benefit from the insights of leading analytics research groups in the UK. This course offers a balance of management skills and data analytics proficiency. During a 3-month industry placement, work on a genuine business project and gain hands-on experience. This programme, backed by the renowned CORMSIS group, offers a broad array of optional modules to suit your career plans. The placement opportunity provides real-world exposure with partners like British Airways and Deloitte Analytics. Graduates find opportunities in various sectors including manufacturing, retail, and transportation, in roles such as logistics planner or supply chain manager.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
